articles.description: The Trump administration plans to announce the long-anticipated federal rule officially banning bump stocks in the coming days, according to US officials familiar with the matter.

articles.author: Christina Maxouris and Brandon Griggs, CNN
articles.title: This university is arming students and faculty with hockey pucks in case of a shooting
articles.description: They're hoping it will never happen. But if a shooter shows up on their campus, students and professors at a university in Michigan may be throwing hockey pucks.

articles.author: Maggie Hiufu Wong
articles.title: China green lights first underwater high-speed railway
articles.description: China has green lighted a project to build the country's first underwater bullet train route. The line will connect Ningbo, a port city south of Shanghai, to Zhoushan, an archipelago off the east coast.

articles.title: Little boy steals Pope Francis' spotlight
articles.description: A 6-year-old from Argentina walked on to the Vatican stage during Pope Francis' papal audience. "He has something that made me think. He is free," said the Pope.

articles.title: ¿Existieron los unicornios? Este animal vivió hace 39.000 años con los neandertales
articles.description: No te desilusiones: aunque este unicornio no se parece a lo que puedes estar imaginando, es fascinante. Su cuerno podía medir hasta un metro de largo y era una criatura gigante. También peluda. ¿Por qué se extinguió?
articles.content: Lo más importante Un rinoceronte gigante extinto, descrito como unicornio siberiano vivió en el planeta más tiempo de lo que inicialmente pensaron los científicos La criatura peluda deambuló alguno vez entre los humanos, sobreviviendo en Europa oriental y Asi… [+2409 chars]
